createUserWithEmailAndPassword=function createUserWithEmailAndPassword(name,email,password){return firebase.auth().createUserWithEmailAndPassword(email,password).then(function(response){updateUser(name);var newUser=response.user;newUser.error='';newUser.success=true;newUser.isSignIn=true;newUser.name=name;return newUser;}).catch(function(error){var errorMessage=error.message;var newUser={};newUser.success=false;newUser.error=errorMessage;return newUser;});};export var signInUserWithEmailAndPassword=function signInUserWithEmailAndPassword(email,password){return firebase.auth().signInWithEmailAndPassword(email,password).then(function(response){var newUser=response.user;newUser.name=newUser.displayName;newUser.error='';newUser.success=true;newUser.isSignIn=true;return newUser;}).catch(function(error){var newUser={};newUser.error=error.message;newUser.success=false;return newUser;});};var updateUser=function updateUser(name){var user=firebase.auth().currentUser;user.updateProfile({displayName:name}).catch(function(error){console.log('error');});};export var signOutAll=function signOutAll(){return
